entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of rain showers or wet flurries. High plus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 30 percent chance of rain showers or wet flurries late this morning and early this afternoon. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming west 40 gusting to 60 this afternoon. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 9 this afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Clearing early this evening. Increasing cloudiness overnight. Wind west 30 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 14. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Tuesday 14 March 2023
